description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、律师，党外运动重要人物，曾任第八届民主进步党主席。因其在反核运动中的形象，也被称为“斗笠人”。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, lawyer, a prominent figure in the Tangwai movement, and the 8th Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. He is also known as the 'Douli Man' for his image in the anti-nuclear movement.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的妻子，曾当选立法委员。
description.en: Wife of Lin Yi-hsiung, formerly served as a member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的长女，林宅血案的唯一幸存者。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Lin Yi-hsiung and the sole survivor of the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的母亲，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: Mother of Lin Yi-hsiung, who was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿之一，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: One of Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughters, who was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿之一，于林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: One of Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughters, who was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1979年在台湾高雄市发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，事件后中华民国政府对党外运动人士进行了大规模逮捕和审判。
description.en: A major clash between police and civilians that occurred in Kaohsiung, Taiwan in 1979, after which the ROC government conducted mass arrests and trials of Tangwai movement activists.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1980年2月28日的灭门血案，受害者为时任台湾省议员林义雄的母亲与双胞胎女儿，长女亦受重伤。当时林义雄因美丽岛事件而被羁押。
description.en: A familicide that occurred on February 28, 1980. The victims were the mother and twin daughters of then-Taiwan Provincial Assembly member Lin Yi-hsiung; his eldest daughter was also severely injured. Lin was in custody for the Kaohsiung Incident at the time.

description.zh-cn: 台湾党外运动重要人士，曾任台湾省议会议员。
description.en: An important figure in Taiwan's Tangwai movement, who served as a member of the Taiwan Provincial Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 由林义雄和方素敏创办的非营利组织，旨在培养社会和政治改革运动人才。
description.en: A non-profit organization founded by Lin Yi-hsiung and Fang Su-min, aiming to cultivate talents for social and political reform movements.

description.zh-cn: 由林义雄等人创立的社会运动团体，旨在推动以公民投票方式决定龙门核能发电厂的兴建与否。
description.en: A social movement group founded by Lin Yi-hsiung and others, aiming to promote the use of referendums to decide on the construction of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党党员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who formerly served as the Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

en: Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who formerly served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指2000年陈水扁当选中华民国总统，实现台湾历史上首次和平的政党轮替。
description.en: Refers to the election of Chen Shui-bian as President of the Republic of China in 2000, marking the first peaceful transfer of power between political parties in Taiwan's history.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市贡寮区的核能发电厂，其兴建与否在台湾社会引发长期争议。
description.en: A nuclear power plant located in Gongliao District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, whose construction has been a subject of long-term controversy in Taiwanese society.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁担任中华民国总统期间的行政团队。
description.en: The executive team during Chen Shui-bian's presidency of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在将中华民国立法委员席次减半的政治改革运动。
description.en: A political reform movement aimed at halving the number of seats in the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任行政院院长、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who has served as Premier of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who has served as President of the Republic of China and Chairwoman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 由林义雄成立的基金会，主张修改宪法、补正《公民投票法》等目标。
description.en: A foundation established by Lin Yi-hsiung that advocates for goals such as amending the constitution and rectifying the Referendum Act.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄为呼吁政府停止兴建龙门核能发电厂而发起的无限期绝食抗议行动。
description.en: An indefinite hunger strike initiated by Lin Yi-hsiung to urge the government to halt the construction of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant.

description.zh-cn: 马英九担任中华民国总统期间的行政团队。
description.en: The executive team during Ma Ying-jeou's presidency of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2014年台湾的一场由大学学生和公民团体主导的社会运动，旨在反对当时执政的中国国民党政府企图通过《海峡两岸服务贸易协议》。
description.en: A social movement in Taiwan in 2014, led by university students and civic groups, protesting the then-ruling Kuomintang government's attempt to pass the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who formerly served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who formerly served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期台北州罗东郡下辖的行政区，现为宜兰县五结乡。
description.en: An administrative division under Ratō District, Taihoku Prefecture during the Japanese rule of Taiwan, now Wujie Township, Yilan County.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，林义雄担任郭雨新竞选立法委员团队的法律顾问。
description.en: In 1975, Lin Yi-hsiung served as the legal counsel for Kuo Yu-hsin's legislative election campaign team.

description.zh-cn: 美丽岛事件发生后，林义雄于1979年12月13日遭到政府逮捕，后被军事法庭判处12年有期徒刑。
description.en: After the Kaohsiung Incident, Lin Yi-hsiung was arrested by the government on December 13, 1979, and later sentenced to 12 years in prison by a military tribunal.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的母亲林游阿妹在林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung's mother, Lin Yu-a-mei, was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿林亮均在林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughter, Lin Liang-chun, was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的双胞胎女儿林亭均在林宅血案中遇害。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung's twin daughter, Lin Ting-chun, was murdered in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的长女林奂均在林宅血案中身受重伤。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung's eldest daughter, Lin Huan-chun, was severely injured in the Lin family massacre.

description.zh-cn: 林宅血案发生后，时任总统蒋经国同意让林义雄交保出狱以料理丧事。
description.en: After the Lin family massacre, then-President Chiang Ching-kuo agreed to release Lin Yi-hsiung on bail to handle funeral arrangements.

description.zh-cn: 李登辉总统发布特赦令，宣告林义雄等人的美丽岛事件罪刑无效。
description.en: President Lee Teng-hui issued a special pardon, declaring the criminal sentences of Lin Yi-hsiung and others from the Kaohsiung Incident null and void.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄于1986年加入民主进步党，后因理念不合于2006年退出。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung joined the Democratic Progressive Party in 1986 and later withdrew in 2006 due to ideological differences.

position.zh-cn: 第八届民主进步党主席
position.en: 8th Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party

description.zh-cn: 在1996年总统选举的民主进步党党内初选中，彭明敏击败林义雄，成为民进党总统候选人。
description.en: In the Democratic Progressive Party's primary for the 1996 presidential election, Peng Ming-min defeated Lin Yi-hsiung to become the DPP's presidential candidate.

description.zh-cn: 因反对时任党主席许信良的修宪方向，林义雄公开批评许信良并提出“罢免许主席”行动。
description.en: Due to his opposition to the constitutional amendment direction of then-DPP Chairman Hsu Hsin-liang, Lin Yi-hsiung publicly criticized Hsu and proposed a 'Recall Chairman Hsu' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 担任党主席期间，林义雄通过《台湾前途决议文》并强势主导党内提名，为陈水扁参选并当选总统铺平了道路，促成了台湾首次政党轮替。
description.en: During his chairmanship, Lin Yi-hsiung pushed through the 'Resolution on Taiwan's Future' and strongly guided the party's nomination process, paving the way for Chen Shui-bian's candidacy and election as president, which led to Taiwan's first party alternation.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁于2000年当选总统，完成了台湾首次政党轮替。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian's election as president in 2000 completed Taiwan's first party alternation.

description.zh-cn: 在在野党压力下，陈水扁政府妥协，宣布恢复兴建龙门核能发电厂。
description.en: Under pressure from opposition parties, the Chen Shui-bian administration compromised and announced the resumption of the construction of the Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant.

description.zh-cn: 因陈水扁政府宣布恢复兴建核四，林义雄无法接受并辞去民进党首席顾问，双方关系出现裂痕。
description.en: Due to the Chen Shui-bian administration's announcement to resume construction of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant, Lin Yi-hsiung found it unacceptable and resigned as chief advisor to the DPP, leading to a rift in their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄发起“诚信立国”运动，并以绝食静坐等方式，成功推动立法院席次减半的修宪案。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung initiated the 'Build the Nation on Integrity' movement and, through methods like hunger strikes and sit-ins, successfully pushed for the constitutional amendment to halve the number of legislative seats.

description.zh-cn: 在2006年民进党主席补选中，林义雄发表公开信，呼吁有意参选总统者不宜参选党主席，此举被视为针对游锡堃。
description.en: In the 2006 DPP chairmanship by-election, Lin Yi-hsiung issued an open letter urging those with presidential ambitions not to run for party chairman, a move seen as targeting Yu Shyi-kun.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，林义雄出面劝进蔡英文参选民主进步党主席。
description.en: In 2008, Lin Yi-hsiung came forward to persuade Tsai Ing-wen to run for the chairmanship of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 林义雄的无限期禁食行动最终迫使马英九政府于2014年4月27日宣布核四一号机封存、二号机停工。
description.en: Lin Yi-hsiung's indefinite hunger strike ultimately forced the Ma Ying-jeou administration to announce on April 27, 2014, that Unit 1 of the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant would be sealed and Unit 2 construction would be halted.

description.zh-cn: 太阳花学运期间，林义雄前往立法院议场外静坐声援，直至运动结束。
description.en: During the Sunflower Student Movement, Lin Yi-hsiung went to sit in protest outside the Legislative Yuan in support of the movement until it concluded.
